Poor service.  For poor explanation on how you pay for your food here.  You keep track of toothpicks for payment.  This was not explained and when a toothpick was thrown away by our group not knowing its importance it was replaced by A USED TOOTHPICK FROM A DIRTY PLATE PUT ON OUR PLATE OF FOOD.  When this was pointed out they were very rude.  Also I have a food allergy and when I asked to make sure the food I chose was for me was safe they were very rushed and made me feel as if I was bothering them.  Avoid at all costs as there are a million better options in Barcelona.  By the way, the food was only decent.
